attributes.action: Demand Government remove taxation to fund health service and social care.
attributes.additional_details:
We were promised National Insurance taxes would not be raised.

£350million a week is equivalent to £17 billion a year, our votes were based on the premise that a large chunk of this would be funding Health and social care.
attributes.background:
Find a way to tax those who can afford to fund these services.
There is also additional yearly £17 Billion unaccounted for!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596514
